description:
Experience cozy warmth and comfort during your early fall and late spring rides with these versatile tights. Crafted with industry leading Superroubaix™ fabric to keep you snug and comfortable, they're the perfect companions for your cooler cycling adventures.

  • Designed exclusively for women to prioritize fit and comfort during cooler rides
  • Industry-leading Superroubaix™ fabric guarantees exceptional comfort, warmth, and breathability
  • Women-specific top-quality Italian-made custom CyTech chamois pad
  • Extra length for a flattering shape
  • Enhanced visibility in low-light conditions thanks to a reflective back panel
  • Enjoy comfort throughout your ride with light and wide mesh straps
  • A double-layered calf band adds to the overall comfort and fit
  • Regular fit for comfort
name: Peppermint Classic Tights - Women's
